# Tabellen exportieren


## mit `kable()`

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
```


```{r}
data(mtcars)
```

```{r}
mtcars_short <- 
mtcars %>% 
  slice(1:3) %>% 
  select(1:3)
  
mtcars %>% 
  kable()
```


## Mit `apatables`


```{r}
library(apaTables)
```

```{r}
apa.cor.table()
```
